column2: fitbpi %>% ggplot(aes(cdisc_centered, totbpi)) + geom_smooth(method= "lm", aes(color= SCHCOMP), se= F) +ggtitle("Total Behavior Problem Index Score vs. Child Discrimination") +labs(color = "School Composition") +ylab("Total Behavior Problem Index Score")+ xlab("Child Discrimination (centered)")
